TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit TrackingProfileCache extends System.Object
public ref class TrackingProfileCache abstract sealed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 提供主應用程式可用於清除追蹤設定檔快取的方法。

span.span: Provides a method that a host application can use to clear the tracking profile cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 當工作流程執行階段引擎有一個或多個向它登錄的追蹤服務時，執行階段追蹤基礎結構必須判斷載入記憶體中的工作流程有無追蹤設定檔。When the workflow runtime engine has one or more tracking services registered with it, the runtime tracking infrastructure must determine whether tracking profiles exist for any workflow that is loaded into memory. 執行階段追蹤基礎結構會維護追蹤設定檔的快取，在它向每個追蹤服務要求工作流程的 之前會先檢查這個快取。The runtime tracking infrastructure maintains a cache of tracking profiles which it checks before it requests a for the workflow from each tracking service. 類別提供一個靜態方法 ，可供主應用程式用來清除追蹤設定檔快取。The class provides a static method, , which a host application can use to clear the tracking profile cache. 如此將會強制執行階段追蹤基礎結構從它登錄的追蹤服務中，為清除快取之後載入記憶體中的工作流程執行個體載入追蹤設定檔。This will force the runtime tracking infrastructure to load tracking profiles from its registered tracking services for any workflow instances that are loaded into memory after the cache is cleared. > [!NOTE] > 快取不支援僅標記工作流程。 caching is not supported for markup only workflows.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void Clear() cil managed

summary.span: 清除由所有追蹤設定檔的執行階段追蹤基礎結構維護的追蹤設定檔快取。

span.span: Clears the tracking profile cache maintained by the runtime tracking infrastructure of all tracking profiles.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 清除快取後，執行階段追蹤基礎結構將會直接從它登錄的追蹤服務中，為載入記憶體中的工作流程執行個體載入追蹤設定檔。After the cache is cleared, the runtime tracking infrastructure will load tracking profiles directly from its registered tracking services for any workflow instances loaded into memory. 除非工作流程卸載並重新載入記憶體中，否則已在記憶體內執行中的工作流程執行個體將不需要重新載入其追蹤設定檔。Any workflow instance that is in memory and is running will not need to have its tracking profiles reloaded unless the workflow is unloaded and then reloaded into memory.
